description: Experience a whole new dimension in acoustic excellence with the Creative HQ-1600 headphones. Powerful 40mm Neodymium drivers accurately reproduce sound and provide sonic punch with any source, while Copper-Clad Aluminum Wire (CCAW) voice coils further enhance the clarity of audio playback. Connect the HQ-1600 easily to your MP3 player or home entertainment system with the supplied gold-plated plug and extendable high-purity Oxygen-Free Copper cable, and get clear audio performance that's music to your ears.
title: Creative HQ-1600 Headphones (Chrome) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
